Package menu.StudentMenu

Class StudentMenuControl

java.lang.Object
menu.StudentMenu.StudentMenuControl
public class StudentMenuControl extends Object
Control class for the Student menu. Responsibilities: - Register and route menu keys to MenuAction implementations. - Provide small helper operations that actions may call back into (e.g., toggling filters and recommendations). The class holds a FilterManager instance to manage the student's filtering and recommendation preferences.

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(String key)
      Route the given key to the registered action and execute it. Unknown keys produce a user-friendly message.
      Parameters:
      key - the menu key entered by the user
